products.name: x REVOLVE Anisa Midi Skirt
products.brandedName: Michael Costello x REVOLVE Anisa Midi Skirt
products.description: x REVOLVE Anisa Midi Skirt x REVOLVE Anisa Midi Skirt Introducing the Michael Costello x REVOLVE Anisa Midi Skirt in sleek black. Embrace curves with its bodycon fit. A staple pencil skirt, versatile for any occasion. Elevate your style effortlessly.. Self: 80% modal 20% polyester Lining: 92% polyester 8% elastane. Made in China. Dry clean only. Fully lined. Pull-on styling with elastic waistband. Lightweight ribbed jersey fabric with back vent Item not sold as a set. Skirt measures approx 34 in length. MELR-WQ99. MCQ109 U23. A specialist in statement gowns, Michael Costello has dressed the likes of Beyonce, Cardi B, Kim Kardashian, and Lady Gaga. He became a household name in 2010 after appearing on Project Runway, and has since established himself as a designer of sexy show-stoppers. Think draped, jewel-toned fabrics alongside curve-flattering silhouettes with high slits and open backs. Guided by the principle that everyone should feel confident when they dress, Michael Costello is meant to be worn by women of all shapes and sizes. It is the ideal label for those nights that call for something striking and unapologetic to strut, spin, and sashay in.

products.name: Cotopaxi Trozo 8L Cada Dia Shoulder Bag
products.brandedName: Cotopaxi Trozo 8L Cada Dia Shoulder Bag
products.description: When the day calls for getting up and going look no further than the Cotopaxi Trozo 8L shoulder bag. The large main compartment holds everything we need to be on the move all day long and the three smaller pockets are perfect for keeping us organized. The adjustable shoulder strap made of rope helps to make sure everyone knows we'd rather be at the climbing gym.
